thread.title: VOTE: Keep 'em or Leave 'em, which Rangers do you want to see return to the clubhouse in 2016?
thread.title_full: VOTE: Keep 'em or Leave 'em, which Rangers do you want to see return to the clubhouse in 2016? | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: VOTE: Keep 'em or Leave 'em, which Rangers do you want to see return to the clubhouse in 2016?
text:
It's never too early to start looking ahead to next season, and with the way the Rangers exited 2015, spring training can't come soon enough.
Nine players already have their contracts locked in for next season:
Elvis Andrus, Adrian Beltre, Shin-Soo Choo, Yu Darvish, Prince Fielder, Cole Hamels, Josh Hamilton, Derek Holland, and Martin Perez.
That's a lot of space left on the 2016 roster. So, the question is...which players do you want to see back in Arlington next season?
(Note: Narrowed our poll the Rangers' unrestricted free agents and arbitration-eligible players)
Pitchers Anthony Bass, RP
Jake Diekman, RP
Yovani Gallardo, SP
Colby Lewis, SP
Ross Ohlendorf, RP
Tanner Scheppers, RP
Nick Tepesch, SP
Shawn Tolleson, RP
Catchers Carlos Corporan, C
Robinson Chirinos, C
Chris Gimenez, C
Bobby Wilson, C
Infielders Mitch Moreland, 1B
Mike Napoli, 1B, DH
Jurickson Profar, 2B, SS
Outfielders Kyle Blanks, LF
Leonys Martin, CF
Drew Stubbs, CF
Will Venable, CF
